Environmental Services

email address herephone number heresms phone number herefax number hereminicom number here

Family fun days, bug hunts, health walks, illustrated talks, organised sports, and international youth cycling, just some of the activities in our popular programme of summer events across the Council's parks.

Park wardens and council staff are working to stage a series of activities to cater for all tastes. So if it's nature hunts, roller hockey, outdoor music, or arts and crafts you're after, there's plenty of fresh air fun for everyone.

For more information please contact us using the details above.
